original_title: Kabadio - O tempo não tem pressa, anda descalço
overview: Discover the daily life of a small Muslim village in the Casamansa region, southern Senegal, full of rites, music and magic. The inhabitants try to survive and maintain their traditions, in the midst of civil war and the smuggling of goods.
tagline: Time is in no hurry, walk barefoot
title: Kabadio - Time Goes Slowly, Barefoot
